Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel up the 4,200km of one of the last remaining nourishing rivers in the world.

Clip.Title: ISLAM AND THE WEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In this 3-part series, investigate the proliferation of Islam into Europe and beyond.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel across the entire island of Sicily by train and uncover some cultural history along the way.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of Nova Scotia is a living historical record of the centuries-old battle between the French and the English in the New World, along one of the Atlantic's most remote, hostile coastlines.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Americans are invading and Lower Canada is undermanned, forcing Charles de Salaberry to rely on cunning tactics.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out why some inquiring minds believe that the world is headed for ruin within the next century.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Burlesque artist Dita von Teese drops by to find the perfect frock for a red-carpet event, while a costume designer from "Glee" shops for the cast's wardrobe. It's just another day at the office inside L.A.'s finest vintage store, The Way We Wore(r).

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: PHIL COLLINS: GOING BACK TO DETROIT
Clip.Episode: Phil Collins: Going Back to Detroit
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Phil Collins back to the birthplace of Motown, as he joins the Funk Brothers for one soul-filled night of legendary music.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A whole region to discover with landscapes telling of ancient stories between the blue sea and the fascinating inland, from its caves carved in rock, to the small fishing villages, to tastes, traditions and local folklore.

Clip.Title: MINDFIELD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Dr. Jessie wants to harness the energy of the wind to produce energy systems for small scale application; " A turbine on every farm." Change is in the wind as he blazes a trail through the prairies and onto the international stage.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Emotions Revealed, Future History, Amateur Astronomers and 3-D Microscopes
Clip.EpisodeSummary: See how our facial muscles involuntarily reveal emotions like sadness and anger. And, what does our use of bottled water say about us? And, some of the world's most passionate astronomers don't even need to leave their own backyards. And cutting-edge microscopes are helping to create new medical breakthroughs.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Chasing Beetles, Finding Darwin and Ladybug Mystery
Clip.EpisodeSummary: When Charles Darwin published "On the Origin of Species," he transformed the biological sciences forever. 150 years later, Darwin's ideas remain as central to scientific exploration as ever. Entomologist David Kavanaugh, who discovered a new species of beetle in 1980, predicted that a second new beetle species would be found in the same area. Find out if his prediction came true.

Clip.Title: SKIN DEEP
Clip.EpisodeSummary: New research reveals the crucial role our skin color plays in our species' survival and reproduction, while dispelling narrow-minded notions that have plagued us throughout history.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.
